title: How to Make an Artificial Sweetened Soda Syrup

steps.headline: Mix all the ingredients in a saucepan and bring them to the boil.
Taste it to see if it as sweet as you want it.
You can drink it straight away or refrigerate it.
The sweetener tastes more natural and is a lot better for your body.

text: Mix all the ingredients in a saucepan and bring them to the boil.  Turn down the heat  Taste it to see if it as sweet as you want it.  Let it cool completely.  Pour it into a bottle.  You can drink it straight away or refrigerate it.  The sweetener tastes more natural and is a lot better for your body.
